verses.text: \w Judge|strong="H8199"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* against an \w ungodly|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: O \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* me from the \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* and \w unjust|strong="H5766"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 43.1 \ft ungodly: or, unmerciful\f*\f + \fr 43.1 \ft the deceitful…: Heb. a man of deceit and iniquity\f*

For thou \add art\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*: why dost thou cast me \w off|strong="H2186"\w*? why \w go|strong="H1980"\w* I \w mourning|strong="H6937"\w* because of the \w oppression|strong="H3906"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*?

O send \w out|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* and thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: let them \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me; let them \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* me unto thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, and to thy \w tabernacles|strong="H4908"\w*.

Then will I \w go|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, unto \w God|strong="H0410"\w* my \w exceeding|strong="H8057"\w* \w joy|strong="H1524"\w*: yea, upon the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* will I \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 43.4 \ft my exceeding…: Heb. the gladness of my joy\f*

Why art thou cast \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? and why art thou \w disquieted|strong="H1993"\w* within me? \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for I shall yet \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* him, \add who is\add* the \w health|strong="H3444"\w* of my \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, and my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
